p: The A/Michigan/45/2015 A(H1N1)pdm09, A/HongKong/4801/2014 A(H3N2) and B/Brisbane/60/2008 (Victoria lineage) influenza viruses were kindly provided by the WHO Collaborating Center in Atlanta, US. The A/Anhui/01/2013 A(H7N9) virus was kindly provided by the WHO Collaborating Center in Beijing, China. The A/great crested grebe/Tyva/34/2016 A(H5N8) virus was isolated by the authors in Western Siberia in 2016 [ 11].
